meanings.sent1: The path was trodden by many feet.
meanings.sent2: She trodden carefully on the fragile ground.
meanings.sent3: The cat trodden across the muddy garden, leaving tiny paw prints everywhere.
meanings.sent4: His dreams were trodden upon by harsh reality.
meanings.sent5: The memories of her childhood were trodden into the fabric of her mind.

meanings.sent1: The flowers were trodden by careless hikers.
meanings.sent2: He trodden on the fallen leaves without noticing.
meanings.sent3: The cake was accidentally trodden on by the playful puppy.
meanings.sent4: Her feelings were trodden by his thoughtless words.
meanings.sent5: The fragile hope in his heart was trodden by despair.

meanings.sent1: The trodden path led through the dense forest.
meanings.sent2: The trodden snow crunched under their boots.
meanings.sent3: The trodden grass showed the way the deer had gone.
meanings.sent4: His trodden shoes told the story of a long journey.
meanings.sent5: The trodden earth bore witness to the passage of time.
